# Chwarstno

Chwarstno (Polish pronunciation: ; ) is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Węgorzyno, within Łobez County, West Pomeranian Voivodeship, in north-western Poland. It lies is approximately  west of Węgorzyno,  south-west of Łobez, and  east of the regional capital Szczecin.
